text: That wife is under investigation for the #murder of her husband. She did it on purpose. 1/8 teaspoon per 10 gallon verses 1 teaspoon per 20 ounce soda is what she gave him. She used #chloroquine phosphate not #hydroxychloroquine which is what @realDonaldTrump was talking about. https://t.co/KwadxL2Ks2
